00036 #ifndef _NODEATTRIBUTES_HPP_
00037 #define _NODEATTRIBUTES_HPP_
00038 
00039 #include "UblasVectorInclude.hpp"
00040 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00041 #include <boost/serialization/vector.hpp>
00042 
00046 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00047 class NodeAttributes
00048 {
00049 private:
00050 
00052     std::vector<double> mAttributes;
00053 
00055     unsigned mRegion;
00056 
00058     c_vector<double, SPACE_DIM> mAppliedForce;
00059 
00061     double mRadius;
00062 
00064     bool mIsParticle;
00065 
00067     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00068 
00075     template<class Archive>
00076     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00077     {
00078         archive & mAttributes;
00079         archive & mRegion;
00080         archive & mRadius;
00081         archive & mIsParticle;
00082 
00083         for (unsigned d = 0; d < SPACE_DIM; d++)
00084         {
00085             archive & mAppliedForce[d];
00086         }
00087     }
00088 
00089 public:
00090 
00094     NodeAttributes();
00095 
00099     std::vector<double>& rGetAttributes();
00100 
00106     void AddAttribute(double attribute);
00107 
00113     unsigned GetRegion();
00114 
00120     void SetRegion(unsigned region);
00121 
00127     c_vector<double, SPACE_DIM>& rGetAppliedForce();
00128 
00134     void AddAppliedForceContribution(c_vector<double, SPACE_DIM>& appliedForceContribution);
00135 
00139     void ClearAppliedForce();
00140 
00146     bool IsParticle();
00147 
00152     void SetIsParticle(bool isParticle);
00153 
00159     double GetRadius();
00160 
00166     void SetRadius(double radius);
00167 };
00168 
00169 #endif //_NODEATTRIBUTES_HPP_
